item.title: Schedule
item.description: 2017-02-14 Set up blog Look into win probability calculation Make a nice probability graph 2017-02-21 Create Shiny app Move graphs to Shiny Automate creation of graphs Set up hosting 2017-03-03 Improve Shiny UI Improve Shiny UX Add API endpoints to support the above improvements 2017-03-22 Research win probability modeling Play around with baseballr package Practice more specific analysis 2017-03-29 Modeling pitcher performance by inning Combining ggplot plots
